thread.title: Dell XPS 15 hands-on review

title: Dell XPS 15 hands-on review
text:
Dell XPS 15 hands-on review 
The Inquirer Saturday 24th October, 2015 
, including the addition of Intel Skylake processors and up to 1TB of storage. 
But what's most interesting about the upgrades is that the firm added an edge-to-edge 'Infinity edge' display to the XPS 15, fitting a 15.6in screen into the size of a typical 13in notebook, making what Dell claims is "smallest 15in laptop on the planet". 
We got to take a closer look at the updated system at...
